level.heading: Voting provisions - Application to voting by delegates.
level.text: If an association has provided for voting by delegates, any provision of this chapter referring to votes cast by the members shall apply to votes cast by delegates, but this shall not permit delegates to vote by mail or electronic mail.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 added "or electronic mail" at the end of the section.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
